original_text:
And the head of Ephraim is Samaria,
    and the head of Samaria is the son of Remaliah.
If you are not firm in faith,
    you will not be firm at all.’”
korean_text: 에브라임의 머리는 사마리아요 사마리아의 머리는 르말리야의 아들이니라 만일 너희가 굳게 믿지 아니하면 너희는 굳게 서지 못하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And the head of Ephraim is Samaria,
and the head of Samaria is the son of Remaliah.
If you are not firm in faith,
you will not be firm at all.’”
